title: School Closure Notice
message: HCSS will be closed on Friday, December 20th due to inclement weather. All after-school activities are also canceled. Please stay safe.

title: Upcoming Half Day
message: Reminder: This Wednesday is a half-day for students due to staff professional development. Dismissal will be at 11:30 AM.

title: Winter Concert
message: Join us for the annual Winter Concert this Thursday at 7:00 PM in the high school auditorium. Our talented students will be performing seasonal favorites.
